column2: # Prepare the data for the dot plot
dot_plot_vis <- ggplot(snl_topics_dot_data, aes(x = mentioned_count, y = topic, color = candidate)) +
title = "SNL Mentions by Topic and Candidate",
subtitle = "Comparison of Trump and Harris Mentions for Each Topic",
axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10),  # Ensure topic labels are readable
